languages.text: "Благодарю за ответ, леди Кассия. Я подумаю, стоит ли принять ваше предложение".

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю за ответ, леди Кассия. Я подумаю, стоит ли принять ваше предложение".

languages.text: "Thank you for your input, Lady Cassia. I will consider whether I should accept your offer."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю за ответ, леди Кассия. Я подумаю, стоит ли принять ваше предложение".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your input, Lady Cassia. I will consider whether I should accept your offer."
"Thank you for your input, Lady Cassia. I will consider whether I should accept your offer."
"Thank you for your input, Lady Cassia. I will consider whether I should accept your offer."

"Thank you for your input, Lady Cassia. I will consider whether I should accept your offer."

languages.text: “谢谢你的意见，卡西娅女士。我会考虑是否要接受你的提议。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your input, Lady Cassia. I will consider whether I should accept your offer."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你的意见，卡西娅女士。我会考虑是否要接受你的提议。”

languages.text: «Gracias por la oferta, lady Cassia. Debo considerar si aceptar su oferta».
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your input, Lady Cassia. I will consider whether I should accept your offer."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias por la oferta, lady Cassia. Debo considerar si aceptar su oferta».

languages.text: 「カシア殿、意見をありがとう。受けるかどうかは慎重に検討させてもらおう」
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your input, Lady Cassia. I will consider whether I should accept your offer."

traits.locale_text: 「カシア殿、意見をありがとう。受けるかどうかは慎重に検討させてもらおう」

languages.text: "Danke für Euren Beitrag, Lady Cassia. Ich werde erwägen, ob ich Euren Vorschlag annehme."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your input, Lady Cassia. I will consider whether I should accept your offer."

traits.locale_text: "Danke für Euren Beitrag, Lady Cassia. Ich werde erwägen, ob ich Euren Vorschlag annehme."

languages.text: « Merci, dame Cassia. Je vais réfléchir à votre offre. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your input, Lady Cassia. I will consider whether I should accept your offer."

traits.locale_text: « Merci, dame Cassia. Je vais réfléchir à votre offre. »

languages.text: "Düşüncelerini paylaştığın için teşekkürler Leydi Cassia. Teklifini kabul edip etmemeyi değerlendireceğim."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your input, Lady Cassia. I will consider whether I should accept your offer."

traits.locale_text: "Düşüncelerini paylaştığın için teşekkürler Leydi Cassia. Teklifini kabul edip etmemeyi değerlendireceğim."
